text: On kasonero, ki ʙa nohaq dar zamin sarkaşī mekunand, ʙa zudī az ojoti xeş rūjgardon sozam, cunon ki har ojatero, ki ʙuʙinand, imon najovarand va agar tariqi hidojat ʙuʙinand, ʙa on naravand va agar tariqi gumrohī ʙuʙinand, ʙo on ʙiravand. Zero onho ojotro durūƣ ʙarovardand va az on ƣaflat kardand
